==============
source testing
==============

Let's test the source code with our custom checker:

  >>> import mypypi
  >>> import mypypi.testing

  >>> skipFileNames = [
  ...     'jquery-1.2.6.js',
  ... ]

  >>> skipFolderNames = [
  ...     'ace',
  ... ]

  >>> mypypi.testing.check(mypypi, skipFileNames=skipFileNames,
  ...     skipFolderNames=skipFolderNames)
  --------------------------------
  locales/de/LC_MESSAGES/pypi01.po
  --------------------------------
  0: untranslated found
        83 items
